name: horizontal_carousel
description: Horizontal carousel for images, videos, divs. Supports variable width content! Easily style and customize.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run browser
scripts.browser: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf window && parcel build cjs/* && mv dist window
scripts.cjs: rm -rf cjs && rollup esm/*.js --format cjs --dir cjs/ --exports auto
